wikipedia_page.main:
Raffaele Claudio Carbosiero  (born 9 June 1964), known as Lino Carbosiero, is a British hair stylist of Italian origin, currently working at the famous Daniel Galvin hair salon in London. He was appointed Member of the Order of the British Empire (MBE) in the 2014 New Year Honours for services to hairdressing.
Carbosiero joins a select list of hairdressers and List of British Italians to be recognised with the award.

response: The hair makeovers were administered by Lino Carbosiero at the Daniel Galvin Salon.

* Lino Carbosiero MBE London — clients include David Cameron, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Adele Adkins and Melania Trump."Revealed: the strategic cuts behind Cameron's swing from right to left." The Independent. 16 October 2010. Retrieved October 5, 2012.
